title: lag?
body: Any body else getting weird lag spikes or packet loss? i never use to lag.. same computer same internet idk what it is lol

replies.body: im constantly sitting on 150 ping and its been spiking over 200 no idea why my net is fine! my ping is usually 50
As of 2 weeks ago i never lagged and had 60 ping, now its 150 - 200 ping and nothings changed -_-
yeah. am now up to 20m low priority queue primarily as a result of lagging out.

I agree. Last night, I had a game where 3 people then 4 dced because they lagged out. And I also lag too because my character ends up freezing in the spot while I get auto attacked and abilitied to death.
like 3-4 months ago i could have any tabs up youtube etc and not lag, these days if i have a video or stream up its like 150 ping lol
Yeah, I just played an aram game to test my connection/warm up. Was nigh unplayable.

Lagging how so? I recently found that in team fights I get excessive lag that looks similar to disconnecting problems (minions walking on the spot, everyone standing still etc.), but after the fight - or after I die - it magically fixes itself... Riot support is on the case (someday soon)
i had same lagg like u, but i got pubnish because i have to fixed something that's y i afk for 2 min. "riot pubnish me becoz iam 2 lagg" WOW
